Title: Increases the age at which a person is considered a child for the purposes of sexual performances by a child
Summary: Increases from 16 to 18 years the age at which a sexual performance by a child becomes a crime on the part of anyone using, employing, authorizing, producing, directing or promoting any such sexual performance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to sexual performance by a child under the age of eighteen years
